categories.name: authentication
categories.description: Authentication failures, MFA issues, and sign-in problems

scenarios.title: Authentication Failures Analysis
scenarios.description: Analyze authentication failures including sign-in errors, MFA issues, and conditional access blocks

categories.name: synchronization
categories.description: Cross-tenant sync, directory sync, and related issues

scenarios.title: Cross Tenant Sync Issues
scenarios.description: Troubleshoot Cross Tenant Synchronization issues including failed syncs, permission errors, and configuration problems

categories.name: provisioning
categories.description: User provisioning, SCIM issues, and application provisioning

scenarios.title: User Provisioning Errors
scenarios.description: Investigate user provisioning failures in connected applications and services

categories.name: performance
categories.description: Performance analysis, slow sign-ins, and latency issues

scenarios.title: Performance Issues - Slow Sign-ins
scenarios.description: Analyze slow authentication performance and identify bottlenecks in the sign-in process

categories.name: applications
categories.description: Application integration, service principal, and consent issues

scenarios.title: Application Integration Issues
scenarios.description: Troubleshoot application registration and integration problems with Azure AD
